issues_fixed.fix: Added focus trap useEffect that keeps Tab/Shift+Tab cycling within modal elements only

issues_fixed.description: Button focus ring not visible in Windows High Contrast Mode
issues_fixed.fix: Added transparent outline alongside box-shadow for High Contrast Mode compatibility

focus_trap.approach: Manual implementation following existing CreateTeamDialog pattern
focus_trap.behavior: Tab on last element wraps to first, Shift+Tab on first element wraps to last

css_focus_ring.approach: Added outline: 2px solid transparent with outline-offset: 2px
css_focus_ring.rationale: Windows High Contrast Mode respects outline property but may ignore box-shadow
